text: 380px Detail Detail Baptism of Christ is a c.1519 oil on panel painting by Parmigianino, the earliest surviving work by the artist, produced when he was only sixteen. It is now in the Gemäldegalerie in Berlin. It is usually identified with an anecdote in Vasari's Lives of the Artists: ==Bibliography (in Italian)== * Luisa Viola, Parmigianino, Parma, 2007 * Mario Di Giampaolo ed Elisabetta Fadda, Parmigianino, Keybook, Santarcangelo di Romagna 2002. * ==References== category:1519 paintings Category:Paintings in the Gemäldegalerie, Berlin category:Paintings by Parmigianino Parmigianino
title: Baptism of Christ (Parmigianino)
